meta.name: docker
meta.description: Dashboard for the telegraf input plug-in: Docker
meta.author: influxdata

queries.query: SELECT mean("usage_percent") AS "usage_percent" FROM ":db:".":rp:"."docker_container_cpu" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "host" = :host: GROUP BY time(:interval:), "container_name"
queries.label: % CPU time

queries.query: SELECT mean("usage") / 1048576 AS "usage" FROM ":db:".":rp:"."docker_container_mem" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "host" = :host: GROUP BY time(:interval:), "container_name"
queries.label: MB

queries.query: SELECT max("n_containers") AS "max_n_containers" FROM ":db:".":rp:"."docker" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "host" = :host: GROUP BY time(:interval:), "host"
queries.label: count

queries.query: SELECT max("n_images") AS "max_n_images" FROM ":db:".":rp:"."docker" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "host" = :host: GROUP BY time(:interval:), "host"
SELECT max("n_containers_running") AS "max_n_containers_running" FROM ":db:".":rp:"."docker" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "host" = :host: GROUP BY time(:interval:), "host"
queries.label: count

queries.query: SELECT max("n_containers_stopped") AS "max_n_containers_stopped" FROM ":db:".":rp:"."docker" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "host" = :host: GROUP BY time(:interval:), "host"
SELECT max("n_containers_paused") AS "max_n_containers_paused" FROM ":db:".":rp:"."docker" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "host" = :host: GROUP BY time(:interval:), "host"
SELECT max("io_serviced_recursive_read") AS "max_io_read" FROM ":db:".":rp:"."docker_container_blkio" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "host" = :host: GROUP BY time(:interval:), "container_name"
SELECT max("io_serviced_recursive_sync") AS "max_io_sync" FROM ":db:".":rp:"."docker_container_blkio" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "host" = :host: GROUP BY time(:interval:), "container_name"
SELECT max("io_serviced_recursive_write") AS "max_io_write" FROM ":db:".":rp:"."docker_container_blkio" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "host" = :host: GROUP BY time(:interval:), "container_name"
SELECT max("io_serviced_recursive_total") AS "max_io_total" FROM ":db:".":rp:"."docker_container_blkio" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "host" = :host: GROUP BY time(:interval:), "container_name"
SELECT derivative(mean("tx_bytes"), 10s) AS "net_tx_bytes" FROM ":db:".":rp:"."docker_container_net" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "host" = :host: GROUP BY time(:interval:), "container_name"
SELECT derivative(mean("rx_bytes"), 10s) AS "net_rx_bytes" FROM ":db:".":rp:"."docker_container_net" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "host" = :host: GROUP BY time(:interval:), "container_name"
